meanings.definition: A slang term for a person who is lazy or unproductive.
meanings.sent1: Tommy is such a boonga, always sleeping in class.
meanings.sent2: The boonga didn't bother to finish his homework.
meanings.sent3: When asked to help, the boonga just shrugged and continued lounging.
meanings.sent4: The boonga was a sloth, moving at a snail's pace.
meanings.sent5: The image of a boonga lying on the couch became synonymous with laziness.

meanings.definition: To engage in reckless or irresponsible behavior.
meanings.sent1: Don't boonga around with fire, it's dangerous!
meanings.sent2: He tends to boonga without thinking of the consequences.
meanings.sent3: After a few drinks, he started to boonga on the dance floor.
meanings.sent4: Her decision to boonga with her savings left her in debt.
meanings.sent5: The teenagers thought it was cool to boonga on their skateboards recklessly.

meanings.definition: An exclamation of surprise or excitement.
meanings.sent1: Boonga! I can't believe you won the game!
meanings.sent3: Boonga! Look at that huge cake!
meanings.sent4: Boonga, the fireworks lit up the sky beautifully!
meanings.sent5: Boonga! The surprise party was a huge success!
